title: Email Address

xdm:primary.title: Primary
xdm:primary.description:
Primary email indicator.

A Profile can have only one `primary` email address at a given point of time.

xdm:address.title: Address
xdm:address.description: The technical address, e.g 'name@domain.com' as commonly defined in RFC2822 and subsequent standards.

xdm:label.title: Label
xdm:label.description: Additional display information that maybe available, e.g MS Outlook rich address controls display 'John Smith smithjr@company.uk', the 'John Smith' part is data that would be placed in the label.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The way the account relates to the person. e.g 'work' or 'personal'

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: An indication as to the ability to use the email address.

xdm:statusReason.title: Status Reason
xdm:statusReason.description: A description of the current status.
